tweets.author_name: Moved on Her Like a Bitch but Couldn't Get There
tweets.html:
The make up and hair pieces on THE STRAIN constitute a separate character all together (also the most subtle character on the show).

tweets.author_name: Eric Goldman Likes the Star Wars
tweets.html:
Good luck, Selfie. I have NEVER seen a show get so much hate for its title alone!

— Eric Goldman Likes the Star Wars (@TheEricGoldman) October 1, 2014

@EricIGN it's almost like ABC is bad at this whole 'coming up with names for tv shows' thing

— Grace (@GemOfAmara) October 1, 2014

‚ÄúIf you hated Selfie because of its name, you‚Äôll love Twerk.‚Äù - ABC, having learned nothing.

SELFIE: TONIGHT, witness the comedy that has the Twitterverse buzzing - Which Twitter is this? Our current universe or an alternate one?

— Alicia Gray (@AliGraysAnatomy) October 1, 2014

Is it still considered a "selfie" if you're by yourself in the photo but you're screaming into a pillow and there's no photo

Less than one minute into Selfie and I have never hated a character more. And I'm including horror and WWII movies.

And on Selfie the airsickness bags broke and I'm out.

Welp, ten minutes in and #Selfie has both won my grumpy heart with a sick Gwyneth burn and annoyed me w/ casual racism. #hashtagthestruggle

17th inning: Yost bunts on defense

20th inning: Yost calls for a bunt during another bunt

23rd inning: Bunt becomes self-aware, bunts

"What a ballgame here tonight," the robot play-by-play man intoned, all the while wondering why it is you humans cry.
